articles.author: Agencies
articles.title: Budget 2024: Opposition walks out of Rajya Sabha over 'neglect' of States; Nirmala Sitharaman hits back - The Hindu
articles.description: INDIA bloc protests Union Budget, alleging discrimination against states, leading to walkout from Rajya Sabha.
articles.content: The INDIA bloc parties, led by the Congress, staged a walkout from the Rajya Sabha on July 24, in protest against all States, except two, being "ignored" in the Union Budget, an allegation termed "ou… [+8014 chars]
